author: rooneg
msg: Finish deprecation of svn_ra_get_dir in favor of svn_ra_get_dir2.
(DIRENT_FIELDS): new constant, holds the dirent fields we care about
(svn_client_ls4): use svn_ra_get_dir2 for the file case, just like
we did for the directory case.

author: dlr
msg: (SVNClient::add): Switch from use of the deprecated
svn_client_add2() function to the modern svn_client_add3()

author: dberlin
msg: Make '-c' reject a negative argument, and make minor improvements
to help and error messages, as a follow-up to r17054.

author: rooneg
